Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver

[Groovy] Class XSLTIncludeClasspathURIResolver

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver.XSLTIncludeClasspathURIResolver
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      URIResolver

      @Log4j
@CompileStatic
class XSLTIncludeClasspathURIResolver
extends Object

      Internal class to resolve includes using class path, inspired by http://stackoverflow.com/a/12453881

      Authors:
      cmahnke

      • Field Summary

          Fields 
          Modifiers Name Description
          protected Class<?>  clazz The caller Class (used to get the ClassLaoder)
          protected URL  stylesheet The URL of the styleshhet to resolve against

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          XSLTIncludeClasspathURIResolver (Object caller, String xslt)
          Constructor which takes the calling classloader into acount
          XSLTIncludeClasspathURIResolver (Class<?> clazz)
          Using this contructor, just look into the class path of the caller to get resources in Jar files and on class path

        • XSLTIncludeClasspathURIResolver(Class<?> clazz)

          Using this contructor, just look into the class path of the caller to get resources in Jar files and on class path

          Class - of the caller, to get the right class loader
